text: Motion
Motion
Motion

──Seems like there are no other questions.
Alright, that’s it for the meeting, dismissed...!
Mano～～～！！
Whoa...!

Good luck being the center for 16 people!!
I’m cheering for you a lot!
Kogane-chan...

If there's anything I can help with,
please let me know!

Kaho-chan...
Yeah...thank you...

...Um, well. I might end up
being a bother, but...

It's fine～!
Let’s work hard while being a bother to each other～!

...Producer-san?
Can I have a moment...?
Sure, what is it?

Um, about the 16-member center!
I think it’s great that Mano-chan was chosen...!

You know, when Mano-chan is next to me,
I feel really at ease.

I guess you could say it’s comfortable...
Like I don’t have to force myself when I'm with her...

If Mano-chan is in the center,
I feel like I can look forward with confidence.
...Yeah
Producer-san,

Um...
Did you have trouble deciding?
...Who would be the best center, right?

...!
...Ah, of course.

While picturing each person’s face...
Thinking about how everyone can shine...

I thought it through
and came to a decision.

...Yeah.
Ehehe, I’m glad I heard that...!

If...this is just a what-if
but if I were chosen as the center,

I’d want to make the whole venue
bloom with smiles from everyone at 283.

Of course, I’m really looking forward to seeing
283 with Mano-chan as the center! ...But you know,

There might be someone who had the dream
of being chosen as the center but couldn’t fulfill it.

I know someone has to be chosen, but I just hope
that everyone as they are now can stay wonderful...

Even though it’s a day to celebrate, I’m sorry.
Amana...just got a little worried.

...Amana, thank you for sharing your feelings.
And I’m sorry for making you worry.

...No, it’s not just Amana...
There might be others who are feeling anxious too.

No, that’s not it!
It’s just me worrying too much...

Everyone knows that Producer-san put a lot of
thought into it... so it’ll be okay.

...Yeah!
I’m really looking forward to it now!

I know it’s tough for you too, Producer-san, but don’t
overdo it. If there’s anything I can do, just let me know!

Alright...!
I’m counting on you.

Ehehe, well then...!
Thank you for your time!

...............
...Yeah, everyone is who they are.

Each of them has their own feelings... Even if we look
at the same sky, the destination isn’t the same...

What I aim to do
is create a special stage for each and every one of them──
I’ll give it my all for that...!
